Posts.Content: Thank you so much...Sorry i just replied your message to me now..I was very busy with my treatment. With God's grace im ok now and hoping by God's merciful grace..hopefully soon i would be able to say i'm cancer survivor... God Bless!
Posts.Title: worried with my breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi I'm 43 years old, last month i was diagnosed with breast cancer, last Friday July 5, 2013 I underwent Mastectomy. While waiting for the result of my biopsy, I can't stop the tears in my eyes thinking of my 3 children my eldest is 18 years old, 2nd 9 and my youngest is 7 years old that really needs my care because i gave birth to him with multiple congenital problem (Hypospadias, imperforate anus & he is a blue baby with TOF) he already underwent series of operations for the correction of the said problem, last year was his Open heart surgery. ..I cried because of my illness, while waiting for the result if what stage is my cancer, i was looking for a furom that could possibly help my tears. I went thru many trials in life that i could say i'm strong enough to handle this but being a human it really hurts me, and asking sometimes why all these things happened to me and to my family. Hope thru this forum i will be able to have strenght. Thank you....

Posts.Title: worried with my breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Ms. Soterial007 I really appreciate your message to me..I thought I already replied you..I've did what you've said to me during my chemotherapy the only thing that i did is to read the bible and list down all the verses that touch my health and healing...truly god is good all the time. I was diagnosed with stage 2A ..and done already w/ my 6 cycles of chemo. Thank God im okey now. My mentainance for 5 years was tamoxifen..with god's grace I hope and pray i'm ok now.. Again big thanks & God Bless!

Posts.Title: worried with my breast cancer

Posts.Content: Peace in Christ everyone specially to those who give time to read and answer my post.. My apologize to you guys for my late response coz I've been busy for the past days going back to my Surgeon for check up, I also consulted to different kind of Medical Oncologist for their good opinions for my Stage 2A Cancer and also I undergo several test in preparation for my Chemotherapy that was scheduled this coming August, just now I was able to face the computer to read your messages for me. From the bottom of my heart I would like to thank you guys, I feel loved and confort when I read your message one by one thanks everyone. God is really good to me for finding this forum CancerCompass. Thank you, Thank you so much. I would like to introduce myself to all of you I'm Salve N. Dionido, from the Philippines. Married to a very loving and Christian Husband with 3 kids my eldest is a boy 18 years old, my 2nd child is a girl 9 years old and my precious youngest son is a boy 7 years old. Since I gave birth to my youngest child I stop working, now I work as a fulltime mom and a church choir in United Methodist Church. I'm happy that all of you has possitive response with my post. I feel ok and will fight for this illness because i believed that God never forsaken his children. By God's grace I will be completely and miraculously healed. I claim His promises & trust His word. Again big Thanks to everyone..God Bless Us All.
Posts.Title: Thanks everyone for your reply to my post
